112.content: Growing up, Cameron (Cam) had always been admiring men with big bellies. He doesn't know why or how, but there's just something amazing about bellies. And being an 8 year old, Cam is a bit smaller than some other kids his age, and so he decided that he has to gain weight in order to catch up his friends. He started to drink a lot of milk and tried to eat more than what he normally would. After couple months of gorging and being lazy, he..
112.title: Get him fat

choices: Let's tell his friend about his passion!
1121.content: When Cameron first decided to gain weight, he'd try so hard to eat more whenever he could. He started to munch on snacks whenever he could get a hand on it, also he'd start to get second helpings at home. After a couple months passed, he started to pack on some pounds. At first he didn't really notice the changes of his body, and neither did his friends. Except that he started getting a little taller thanks to his diet. However, one day before he took a shower, he noticed that his stomach wasn't flat anymore and was actually kinda jiggly. He was kind of glad since that was his first time seeing his belly so soft and is relatively bigger than it once was. He started to play with his belly for a bit and he really liked it! He had always found bellies really cute and is kind of attractive in its own way. He had been admiring people have bellies like his dad. Hus family would usually watch some TV after dinner, and Cam just loves to climb up to his dad and feel the softness and warmth of hus daddy's big belly. However, now he's glad that he has hus own belly to play with. And he had one new goal; to grow even bigger!
1121.title: Gained some fat

11211.content: Another 2 minths had passed, Cameron is still trying to gain weight and get a bigger belly. Everyday when he woke up, his mom would make him a big breakfast, which usually includes a ton of bacon, sausages, eggs and toast. Being the big growing boy as he is, Cameron would usually get a second or even third helpings if he was really hungry. At lunch, Cam would usually eat at the school cafeteria where he could get fattening food like bacon cheese burgers, fries and pizza. After school, Cam would usually do hus new routine before he goes home. He would go to a fast food restaurant called the Burger's Lodge and would order a chesse burger with milkshake. He loves fast food and now that he's gaining weight on purpose, the Burger's Lodge pretty much became his second home. Occasionally his mom would have cookies or cupcakes ready for him after his binging section. And when it comes to dinner, although his family would usually have different food everyday, Cam would always have his second or even third plates filled depends on how hungry he is. Everynight, Cameron would be so excited after dinner because it's iced cream time. Normally parents wouldn't offer their kids iced cream everyday, but Cam's family doesn't have the healthiest diet (look at Cameron and his dad!). And after that comes bed time. Though Cameron would now stand in front of his mirror and would always play with his belly before he goes to bed. He loves playing with his fat; although normally he'd be so stuffed after dinner and his belly would be rock hard for the whole night and becomes jiggly and soft again in the morning. One day, Cameron's parents and sibilings were not home for the whole day, that means he got to stuff his face all he wants. After binging and snacking and being lazy for the whole day, he went to the bathroom to check his weight. Around 6 months ago, Cam was a little shorter than a normal 8 year old, but his weight was normal. He used to weight 24kg (53lbs) and was around 4 feet in height. And after months of pigging out, he now reached 4'2 in height and weight 36kg (80lbs). Cameron had also outgrown most of his clothes, especially in the midsection part. He knew he had growm since he just got those clothes in the beginning of the school year where he would have no problem to fit in before his gain. Cam was really impressed with the result and as a celebration, he wanted to munch on a whole pint of ice cream. As more and more ice cream vanished into his hungry mouth, he started to rub his sticky belly covered in melted ice cream. He likes the feeling when his stomach is slowly getting tighter and stretched to compensate all the food he ate. And after a whole episode of the Family guy, he finished the whole pint of ice cream. And boy! Was he tired after eating nonstop for pretty much the whole day! Cameron went to bed that night with his belly sticking out inches in front of him. He would rub it to try to ease the pain then began to drift off..
11211.title: Another 2 months passed by

121.content:
Jess was bored. Really bored. He was so bored, he felt like he could explode out of sheer boredom. The effeminate young lad sat on his couch in nothing but his white thigh high stockings, which showed off the curves of his legs and feet, his oversized pink shirt, whose sleeves hung over his hands by a bit, and his cute white undies, which proudly revealed his shapely and perky rear. He flicked his short, brown hair out of his face, sighing to himself.
"Maybe there's something on TV." he said as he turned on the TV. He flicked through channels. Dramas, action movies, animal shows, nothing caught his interest. Soon enough however, he'd find something that'd be quite to his liking. He flicked over to a cartoon where a boy was currently being blown up like a balloon, being pumped up with air. Jess started to feel kind of... weird. He felt something in between his legs as he saw the once small boy on the TV grow to gigantic sizes. The scene showed every bit of him inflating, and Jess at this point was both fully erect and confused. For someone his age, he had a surprisingly large member, standing at 7 inches. once the scene ended, Jess turned the TV off. His dick was still hard, and he was starting to sweat from how aroused he had got from watching that.
"What...?" Jess questioned. He knew full well what this feeling was, he just had no clue why he was feeling it. At last, after a bit of thinking, he got it.
"God I wish that were me..." Jess whispered to himself. He got up, and began to think about how he could replicate what he saw on TV...
121.title: Pump him up (Inflation)
